They speak with Bloomberg's Emily Chang on ""Bloomberg Technology.""",Bloomberg Technology,"Thu, 01 Aug 2019 18:49:04 -0400",manda,Negative,Video,FB

https://www.marketwatch.com/story/ftc-examining-facebooks-acquisitions-as-part-of-antitrust-probe-2019-08-01,https://cdn.snapi.dev/images/v1/n/a/fb55-2.jpg,The Wall Street Journal: FTC examining Facebook’s acquisitions as part of antitrust probe,"The Federal Trade Commission is examining Facebook Inc.’s acquisitions as part of its antitrust investigation into the social-media giant — to determine if they were part of a campaign to snap up potential rivals before they could become a threat, according to people familiar with the matter.",Market Watch,"Thu, 01 Aug 2019 17:03:00 -0400",manda,Negative,Article,FB

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-facebook-ftc/ftc-probes-facebooks-acquisition-practices-wsj-idUSKCN1UR5I3,https://cdn.snapi.dev/images/v1/m/j/105356097-1532625399332rtx67jvr.jpg,FTC probes Facebook's acquisition practices - WSJ,"The Federal Trade Commission is probing Facebook Inc  to check if the social media company's acquisitions were aimed at snapping up potential rivals before they could become a threat, reported the Wall Street Journal, citing people familiar with the matter.",Reuters,"Thu, 01 Aug 2019 14:53:13 -0400",,Neutral,Article,FB
